items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute fall dress
items.body: Dress was cute and comfortable. I sized up to use as a maternity dress but the material is very stretch I couldve gotten regular size. The off the shoulder fold over part did ride up a lot but most off the shoulders do. Read more
items.author: Claudia G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit!
items.body: This dress is PERFECT for winter! I am 5' and about 120 lbs and it fit perfectly. The length hit my lower calf and it was snug but had great stretch. The material was also a thicker sweater material that was soft and warm, perfect for fall/winter. Read more
items.author: Purplegummyworms

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars shoulder rides up
items.body: good material but shoulders ride up. Read more
items.author: Elisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality fall / winter dress!
items.body: I LOVE this dress! I needed something for my besties rehearsal dinner and I was worried about the fit because I was a month postpartum but the quality was perfection and I felt so confident wearing it! Definitely recommend for a fall / winter dress. Read more
items.author: Rainey Leigh Maris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit
items.body: Loved the fit and comfort Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it!
items.body: Soft, warm, stretchy. Great quality Read more
items.author: Naomi Lavender

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!

items.author: Felix

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks and fits as described
items.body: Xs fit perfectly. Color is accurate too Is truly a long dress. Surprised the description and pictures are true to product. Very happy with purchase. Read more
items.author: Rachael

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, White, Burgundy, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
